cast.name: 朱莉·勒布勒东 Julie LeBreton

introduction: 在加美边境的小村庄，严肃的海关官员与骄傲的法国厨师意外相遇。为了帮助女儿通过烹饪比赛赢得同学的尊重，一位母亲不得不放下身段求助于这位异国大厨。原是一次严格执法，却演变为一场跨越偏见与性格差异的“美食外交”，一度充满隔阂的邻里情谊也在村庄的笑声与蒸汽中悄然升温。这段始于误解的合作，慢慢成为连接人心的契机，唤起了人们对家庭、梦想与彼此的珍视。在满溢烟火气的厨房中，几代人携手破除心防，以食物为媒，重拾早已遗忘的生活滋味。 本片于2024年萨德伯里国际电影节上获得观众选择奖亚军。In a remote village somewhere on the border between Quebec and the United States, the unyielding customs officer Sonia confiscates the contents of the car belonging to Victor, a French chef living in New York and in need of recognition. She soon regrets it when her daughter, Lili-Beth, decides to take part in a Petits Chefs competition, in which she seems to have little chance of winning. The intractable Sonia then decides to try everything in her power to enlist the help of the charming but exasperating Victor. This more-than-improbable encounter will bring the whole village together to get past their differences and get a taste of what's essential.
